em.strong: Students that have forgotten their email password for the chromebooks can FILL OUT THIS FORM.

a.title: Go to comments for Forgotten Email Address

p.span: To continue our remote education, Vassar Public Schools has a limited number of WiFi hotspots available to staff and students who do not have internet. Please Fill out the application using the link below if you are in need of internet.

a.title: Go to comments for Vassar WiFi Hotspots
Go to comments for School Continuity Approval Guide
Go to comments for Response Plan

p.span: Please read the attached letter regarding Vassar Public Schools Remote Learning Plan for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

a.title: Go to comments for Remote Learning Plan

p.span: Please read the letter from the Superintendent linked here regarding the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

a.title: Go to comments for Governor Whimer Executive Order

p.span: CLICK HERE to review the 2019-2020 Academic Calendar

a.title: Go to comments for 2019-2020 Academic Calendar

p.span: CLICK HERE to fill out household info for the free lunch program that all students receive

a.title: Go to comments for Food Service

p.span: CLICK HERE for School Enrollment Information

a.title: Go to comments for School Enrollment

p.span: CLICK HERE for preschool enrollment information

a.title: Go to comments for Preschool

p.span: CLICK HERE to see Bond Construction Updates

a.title: Go to comments for Bond Construction Updates

p.span: CLICK HERE to review the 2018-19 District Annual Education Report

a.title: Go to comments for 2018-19 AER

span.strong: Click Here to view the 2018-2023 District Strategic Plan.

span.em: The Strategic Plan was developed by staff and community members.

a.title: Go to comments for Strategic Plan

span.div:
Vassar Public Schools utilizes PCMI Staffing Services to fill Substitute Teacher, Parapro and Custodial positions for ALL of our buildings.
If you are interested in part time work visit:
http://pcmiservices.com/pcmi/homepage.aspx
